languages.text: {n}Трудно сказать, слышали вы вздох удивления или просто пробежали помехи. Но Мастер вокса отвечает вам с едва заметным промедлением.{/n} "Как прикажете, Лорд-капитан. Направляю к вам команду зачистки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Трудно сказать, слышали вы вздох удивления или просто пробежали помехи. Но Мастер Вокса отвечает вам с едва заметным промедлением.{/n} "Как прикажете, лорд-Капитан. Направляю к вам команду зачистки".

languages.text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."
languages.original_text: {n}Трудно сказать, слышали вы вздох удивления или просто пробежали помехи. Но Мастер вокса отвечает вам с едва заметным промедлением.{/n} "Как прикажете, Лорд-капитан. Направляю к вам команду зачистки".

traits.locale_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

{n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

{n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

{n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

languages.text: {n}你不太确定你听到的是惊讶的喘息声，还是仅仅是静电的干扰。但音阵大师只是轻微地犹豫片刻，便回答道。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人，我立刻就派遣清理小组。”
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}你不太确定你听到的是惊讶的喘息声，还是仅仅是静电的干扰。但音阵大师只是轻微地犹豫片刻，便回答道。{/n}“遵命，舰长大人，我立刻就派遣清理小组。”

languages.text: {n}Es difícil decir si lo que oyes es un grito ahogado de sorpresa o tan solo un aumento de las interferencias, pero la maestra de vocos solo duda un instante antes de responder.{/n} «A sus órdenes, Lord Capitán. Enviaré al equipo de limpieza de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es difícil decir si lo que oyes es un grito ahogado de sorpresa o tan solo un aumento de las interferencias, pero la maestra de vocos solo duda un instante antes de responder.{/n} «A sus órdenes, Lord Capitán. Enviaré al equipo de limpieza de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}聞こえてくるのが驚きの声なのか、それとも単なる干渉音の高まりなのかはわからない。しかし、ヴォクス・マスターはわずかなためらいもなく答えた。{/n}「仰せのままに、ロード・キャプテン。すぐに清掃チームを向かわせます」
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}聞こえてくるのが驚きの声なのか、それとも単なる干渉音の高まりなのかはわからない。しかし、ヴォクス・マスターはわずかなためらいもなく答えた。{/n}「仰せのままに、ロード・キャプテン。すぐに清掃チームを向かわせます」

languages.text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob du ein überraschtes Keuchen oder einen Ausschlag der Interferenzen hörst. Aber die Voxmeisterin antwortet dir nach kurzem Zögern.{/n} "Wie Ihr befehlt, Lord Captain. Ich werde das Reinigungsteam umgehend zu Euch schicken."
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es ist schwer zu sagen, ob du ein überraschtes Keuchen oder einen Ausschlag der Interferenzen hörst. Aber die Voxmeisterin antwortet dir nach kurzem Zögern.{/n} "Wie Ihr befehlt, Lord Captain. Ich werde das Reinigungsteam umgehend zu Euch schicken."

languages.text: {n}Difficile de dire si le bruit qui s'ensuit est un hoquet de surprise ou une simple recrudescence de parasites. Toujours est-il que lorsque la maîtresse-vox reprend la parole, son hésitation est à peine perceptible.{/n} « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous envoie immédiatement l'équipe de nettoyage. »
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Difficile de dire si le bruit qui s'ensuit est un hoquet de surprise ou une simple recrudescence de parasites. Toujours est-il que lorsque la maîtresse-vox reprend la parole, son hésitation est à peine perceptible.{/n} « À vos ordres, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous envoie immédiatement l'équipe de nettoyage. »

languages.text: {n}Duyduğun şeyin şaşkınlıktan kesilen bir nefes mi yoksa sadece yoğunlaşan parazit mi olduğunu anlayamıyorsun. Fakat Voks Üstadı, biraz tedirgin bir şekilde sana cevap veriyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. Temizlik ekibini hemen yanınıza gönderiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}It is difficult to say if what you hear is a gasp of surprise or simply an uptick in interference. But the Vox Master answers you with only the slightest hesitation.{/n} "As you command, Lord Captain. I will send the cleanup team to you right away."

traits.locale_text: {n}Duyduğun şeyin şaşkınlıktan kesilen bir nefes mi yoksa sadece yoğunlaşan parazit mi olduğunu anlayamıyorsun. Fakat Voks Üstadı biraz tedirgin bir şekilde sana cevap veriyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. Temizlik ekibini hemen yanınıza gönderiyorum."
